pl.myrecipebasket.service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.myrecipebasket.service.UserService

  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    Object UserService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (UserRepository & RoleRepository) and view layer (CommentController & HomeController & RecipeController & @RegisterController & VoteController). Contains all User related business logic of MyRecipeBasket application.
    See Also:
    UserRepository, RoleRepository, CommentController, HomeController, RecipeController, RegisterController, VoteController

      UserService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addWithDefaultRole(User user)
      This method persists User object in MyRecipeBasket database and sets its Role to default before persisting
      User findByUsername(java.lang.String username)
      This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database single User object which name field equals one provided as parameter of this method.
      void saveUser(User user)
      This method persists User object in MyRecipeBasket database.
      void setRoleRepository(RoleRepository roleRepository)
      This method injects RoleRepository object into UserService and enables UserService to perform CRUD operations on Role database table.
      void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
      This method injects UserRepository object into UserService and enables UserService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.

    • Method Detail

      • setUserRepository

        @Autowired
public void setUserRepository(UserRepository userRepository)
        This method injects UserRepository object into UserService and enables UserService to perform CRUD operations on User database table.
        Parameters:
        userRepository - UserRepository object

      • setRoleRepository

        @Autowired
public void setRoleRepository(RoleRepository roleRepository)
        This method injects RoleRepository object into UserService and enables UserService to perform CRUD operations on Role database table.
        Parameters:
        roleRepository - RoleRepository object

      • findByUsername

        public User findByUsername(java.lang.String username)
        This method retrieves from MyRecipeBasket database single User object which name field equals one provided as parameter of this method.
        Parameters:
        username - name of User object that is being looked for
        Returns:
        User object

      • addWithDefaultRole

        public void addWithDefaultRole(User user)
        This method persists User object in MyRecipeBasket database and sets its Role to default before persisting
        Parameters:
        user - User object that is to be persisted

      • saveUser

        public void saveUser(User user)
        This method persists User object in MyRecipeBasket database.
        Parameters:
        user - User object that is to be persisted
